name: My Invincible Counter-Routine
author: 九夏动漫
content: Don’t talk to me about integrity winning is what matters. I, Li Xiangyang, am cunning, despicable, and shameless. So what? If you can, beat me! I have no shame, so I am invincible! Though they say women love bad boys, sorry ladies, this handsome guy isn’t interested in love for now!Original Webtoon
